name: Adidas Ultraboost
description:
Experience comfort and performance like never before with the Adidas Ultraboost — the running shoe that redefined energy return. Designed for runners who demand both style and substance, the Ultraboost features a full-length BOOST midsole that delivers unparalleled cushioning and responsiveness with every step.

The Primeknit upper adapts to the shape of your foot, providing a snug yet flexible fit for all-day comfort, while the Stretchweb outsole with Continental™ Rubber ensures superior traction on any surface, rain or shine. Whether you're chasing a personal best or running through city streets, the Ultraboost offers the perfect blend of performance, innovation, and street-ready design.

Key Features:
- BOOST midsole for exceptional energy return
- Primeknit upper for adaptive support and breathability
- Continental™ Rubber outsole for superior grip
- Torsion System for stability and smooth transitions
- Sleek, modern silhouette for performance and lifestyle wear

Run faster. Feel stronger. Look sharper. Adidas Ultraboost — comfort meets speed.

name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus
description:
The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus continues its legacy as the trusted workhorse for runners worldwide. With responsive cushioning and a smooth ride, this versatile running shoe adapts to your training needs whether you're logging easy miles or pushing the pace.

Key Features:
- Nike Air Zoom units for responsive cushioning
- Breathable mesh upper
- Durable rubber outsole
- Midfoot support for stability

name: Salomon Speedcross 5
description:
Conquer any terrain with the Salomon Speedcross 5. Built for trail runners who demand aggressive grip and precise foothold, this shoe excels in muddy, soft, and technical terrain.

Key Features:
- Aggressive Contagrip outsole for maximum traction
- Quicklace system for easy on/off
- SensiFit technology for secure wrap
- Protective mudguard

name: Atomic Redster G9
description:
The Atomic Redster G9 is a race-ready ski designed for advanced skiers seeking precision and power. With a race-proven construction and World Cup technology, these skis deliver exceptional edge grip and stability at high speeds.

Key Features:
- Power Woodcore for maximum energy transmission
- Ultra Power Titanal for edge grip
- Servotec technology for added control
- Race-specific sidecut for quick turns
- Length: 165-185cm available

name: Rossignol Experience 88 Ti
description:
The Rossignol Experience 88 Ti is the ultimate all-mountain ski for advanced to expert skiers. With its 88mm waist width, this ski performs confidently on groomed runs and handles variable conditions with ease.

Key Features:
- LCT technology for smooth power transfer
- Titanal construction for stability
- Paulownia wood core for lightweight performance
- All-mountain versatility

name: K2 Mindbender 99 Ti
description:
The K2 Mindbender 99 Ti is built for skiers who want it all - precision on groomers and float in powder. This freeride ski combines stability and playfulness for an unmatched all-mountain experience.

Key Features:
- Titanal Y-Beam for torsional rigidity
- All-Terrain Rocker for versatility
- Aspen wood core
- 99mm waist width

name: Blizzard Black Pearl 88
description:
Designed specifically for women who charge hard, the Blizzard Black Pearl 88 delivers power and precision. This all-mountain ski excels in varied conditions and builds confidence with every turn.

Key Features:
- TrueBlend woodcore for smooth flex
- Carbon Flipcore technology
- Women-specific design
- Versatile 88mm waist

name: Burton Custom Camber
description:
The Burton Custom Camber is the gold standard in all-mountain snowboarding. Trusted by pros and weekend warriors alike, this board delivers pop, precision, and versatility for riders who want to do it all.

Key Features:
- Camber profile for responsive edge control
- FSC Certified Super Fly II core
- Squeezebox Low core profiling
- Sintered WFO base for speed

name: Lib Tech T.Rice Orca
description:
Travis Rice's weapon of choice, the Lib Tech T.Rice Orca is a volume-shifted powder slayer that floats effortlessly while maintaining edge control. Perfect for freeriders seeking the ultimate all-terrain board.

Key Features:
- C2 Power Banana contour
- Magne-Traction edges
- Eco-friendly construction
- Short and wide design

name: Jones Frontier Splitboard
description:
The Jones Frontier Splitboard opens up the backcountry for riders seeking untouched powder. This touring-specific board splits in half for uphill efficiency and rides like a solid board on the descent.

Key Features:
- Ultra-light wood core
- Karakoram Ultra Clips
- Directional rocker profile
- Sintered base

name: Capita DOA
description:
The Capita Defenders of Awesome (DOA) is the ultimate jib and park board with all-mountain capabilities. Its playful feel and durable construction make it perfect for creative riders.

Key Features:
- Resort V1 camber profile
- Death Grip sidecut
- P-Tex 2000 Electra sintered base
- 360 degree HolySheet Triax fiberglass

name: Salomon S/Pro 120 Ski Boots
description:
The Salomon S/Pro 120 delivers race-level performance with all-day comfort. These boots feature a customizable fit and precise power transmission for aggressive skiers.

Key Features:
- 120 flex rating
- Custom Shell HD technology
- 360° Custom Fit
- My CustomFit 3D Sport liner
- 100mm last width

name: Tecnica Mach1 MV 130
description:
The Tecnica Mach1 MV 130 combines race performance with customizable comfort. Built for expert skiers who demand precision and power in a medium-volume fit.

Key Features:
- 130 flex index
- C.A.S. customization system
- T-Ride walk mode
- Asymmetrical shell design
- 100mm last

name: Burton Ion Snowboard Boots
description:
The Burton Ion is the ultimate all-mountain boot for riders who demand performance and comfort. With its stiff flex and responsive feel, this boot excels in any terrain.

Key Features:
- Stiff flex rating (8/10)
- 3D molded tongue
- Total Comfort construction
- EST optimized cushioning
- Speed Zone lacing

name: ThirtyTwo TM-2 Double BOA
description:
The ThirtyTwo TM-2 Double BOA is a premium freestyle boot with a medium flex and dual BOA closure system. Perfect for park riders and creative all-mountain shredders.

Key Features:
- Medium flex (6/10)
- Dual BOA Fit System
- Intuition Support Foam 3D liner
- Performance Rubber Outsole
- STI Evolution Foam

name: Marker Griffon 13 ID Bindings
description:
The Marker Griffon 13 ID is a freeride binding built for aggressive all-mountain skiers. With a DIN range of 4-13, these bindings provide reliable release and strong retention.

Key Features:
- DIN 4-13
- Triple Pivot Elite toe
- Inter Pivot heel
- Compatible with GripWalk and Alpine soles
- 110mm brake width

name: Look Pivot 15 GW
description:
The Look Pivot 15 GW is the gold standard for high-performance ski bindings. Trusted by racers and freeriders, these bindings offer the shortest mounting zone and best elastic travel in the industry.

Key Features:
- DIN 6-15
- Turntable heel for multi-directional release
- Full Drive toe
- GripWalk compatible
- 95mm brake width

name: Burton Cartel Bindings
description:
The Burton Cartel is the benchmark all-mountain binding trusted by more pros than any other. Its medium-stiff flex provides responsive control without sacrificing comfort.

Key Features:
- Medium-stiff flex
- Re:Flex mounting system
- Hammockstrap ankle strap
- Supergrip Capstrap
- Living Hinge highback

name: Union Atlas Bindings
description:
The Union Atlas is a stiff, responsive binding designed for aggressive riders. Built with premium materials and construction, these bindings deliver unmatched power transfer.

Key Features:
- Stiff flex
- Stage 11 Duraflex baseplate
- Extruded 3D aluminum heelcup
- Exoframe ankle strap
- Universal disk mounting

name: Leki Carbon 14 3D Poles
description:
The Leki Carbon 14 3D is a premium ski pole featuring ultra-lightweight carbon construction and the innovative Trigger S grip system for secure, quick-release performance.

Key Features:
- 100% HTS 6.0 carbon shaft
- Trigger S Pro G grip system
- Lite Flex Tip
- 60mm racing basket
- Available lengths: 105-130cm

name: Scott 540 P-Lite Poles
description:
The Scott 540 P-Lite offers excellent value with aluminum construction and comfortable ProWeb grips. Perfect for intermediate to advanced skiers.

Key Features:
- 18mm aluminum shaft
- ProWeb Pro grip
- 2K carbon fiber construction on grip area
- Racing basket
- Available lengths: 105-135cm

name: Smith Vantage MIPS Helmet
description:
The Smith Vantage MIPS combines premium protection with exceptional ventilation. MIPS technology reduces rotational forces during impacts, while the hybrid shell construction keeps weight down.

Key Features:
- MIPS Brain Protection System
- Hybrid SL shell construction
- 21 vents with adjustable climate control
- Aerocore construction with Koroyd
- Audio compatible

name: POC Obex BC MIPS
description:
The POC Obex BC MIPS is a lightweight backcountry helmet with optimized ventilation and MIPS protection. Built for ski tourers and splitboarders who need safety without bulk.

Key Features:
- MIPS integration
- Multi-impact EPP liner
- Size adjustment system
- Removable winter kit
- Recco reflector

name: Giro Range MIPS
description:
The Giro Range MIPS delivers reliable protection with a clean, modern design. Stack Ventilation keeps you cool, while MIPS technology adds crucial protection.

Key Features:
- MIPS Spherical technology
- Stack Ventilation system
- In-mold construction
- Fidlock magnetic buckle
- Goggle clip

name: Anon M4 Cylindrical Goggles
description:
The Anon M4 Cylindrical sets the standard for goggle performance. With Magna-Tech quick lens changes and Perceive optics, you'll have optimal vision in any condition.

Key Features:
- Magna-Tech lens interchange
- Perceive lens technology
- MFI face mask compatible
- Integral Clarity Technology anti-fog
- Includes 2 lenses (sunny + cloudy)

name: Oakley Flight Tracker XL
description:
The Oakley Flight Tracker XL offers an expansive field of view with Prizm lens technology. Its rimless design and large fit ensure maximum visibility and comfort.

Key Features:
- Prizm lens technology
- Rimless design for peripheral vision
- Ridgelock lens interchange
- Triple-layer foam
- Compatible with most helmets

name: Smith I/O MAG XL Goggles
description:
The Smith I/O MAG XL combines spherical ChromaPop lenses with rapid lens changing via the MAG system. Perfect for riders who want the best optics and quickest lens swaps.

Key Features:
- MAG lens interchange system
- ChromaPop lens technology
- 5X anti-fog inner lens
- Responsive Fit frame
- Includes 2 lenses

name: Dragon X2 Goggles
description:
The Dragon X2 features a frameless design and Swiftlock lens changing system. Lumalens technology provides exceptional color definition in all light conditions.

Key Features:
- Swiftlock 2.0 lens system
- Lumalens color optimization
- Frameless design
- Super anti-fog coating
- Includes 2 lenses

name: Black Diamond Couloir Harness
description:
The Black Diamond Couloir is a lightweight, minimalist harness designed for ski mountaineering and long alpine approaches. Removable leg loops allow for easy on/off over skis.

Key Features:
- Removable leg loops
- Speed adjust waist buckle
- Bullhorn-shaped waistbelt
- 2 gear loops
- Weight: 218g

name: Ortovox Free Rider 26 Backpack
description:
The Ortovox Free Rider 26 is a technical freeride backpack with a dedicated safety compartment and diagonal ski carry system. Perfect for backcountry missions.

Key Features:
- 26L capacity
- Diagonal ski carry system
- Safety equipment compartment
- Helmet holder
- Hydration system compatible

name: Dakine Heli Pro 20L Backpack
description:
The Dakine Heli Pro 20L is a versatile snow pack with multiple carry options. Vertical and diagonal ski carry, along with a snowboard carry system, make this pack ideal for resort and backcountry.

Key Features:
- 20L capacity
- A-frame and diagonal ski carry
- Vertical snowboard carry
- Fleece-lined goggle pocket
- Rescue whistle sternum strap

name: Swix T75 Digital Waxing Iron
description:
The Swix T75 Digital Waxing Iron provides precise temperature control for optimal wax application. Digital display and thick base plate ensure even heat distribution.

Key Features:
- Digital temperature display
- Thick aluminum base plate
- Temperature range: 100-165°C
- Ergonomic handle
- 1000W power

name: Toko Edge Tuning Kit
description:
The Toko Edge Tuning Kit includes everything needed for perfect edge maintenance. Complete with side edge file guide, diamond stones, and edge angle tool.

Key Features:
- Side edge file guide
- Diamond stones (coarse and fine)
- Gummy stone
- Edge angle tool
- Storage case included

name: Buff Polar Multifunctional Neckwear
description:
The Buff Polar combines moisture-wicking microfiber with Polartec fleece for ultimate neck and face protection in cold conditions. Versatile and comfortable.

Key Features:
- Polartec fleece lining
- Moisture-wicking microfiber
- 100% seamless
- UPF 50+ protection
- Multiple wearing options

name: Arc'teryx Beta AR Jacket
description:
The Arc'teryx Beta AR is a versatile all-around waterproof shell built with GORE-TEX Pro. This jacket handles everything from resort skiing to backcountry touring with reliable protection.

Key Features:
- GORE-TEX Pro 3L construction
- Helmet-compatible StormHood
- Articulated patterning
- Powder skirt with snap integration
- Pit zips for ventilation

name: Patagonia Powder Bowl Jacket
description:
The Patagonia Powder Bowl Jacket delivers waterproof protection with H2No Performance Standard 3-layer fabric. Built for deep days and all-mountain adventures.

Key Features:
- H2No 3-layer waterproof fabric
- Adjustable helmet-compatible hood
- RECCO reflector
- Internal stretch powder skirt
- Fair Trade Certified sewn

name: The North Face Freedom Insulated Pants
description:
The North Face Freedom Insulated Pants combine waterproof protection with lightweight insulation. Perfect for cold resort days and all-mountain riding.

Key Features:
- DryVent 2L waterproof fabric
- Heatseeker Eco insulation
- Adjustable waist tabs
- Boot gaiters with gripper elastic
- Articulated knees

name: Volcom L Gore-Tex Pants
description:
The Volcom L Gore-Tex Pants deliver premium waterproof protection in a modern, relaxed fit. Built with GORE-TEX 2L fabric for reliable performance.

Key Features:
- GORE-TEX 2L construction
- V-Science breathable lining
- Zip Tech jacket-to-pant interface
- Boot gaiters
- Mesh lined venting

name: Smartwool Intraknit Merino Base Layer Top
description:
The Smartwool Intraknit base layer features body-mapped merino wool zones for targeted warmth and breathability. Advanced construction for active pursuits.

Key Features:
- Body-mapped Intraknit construction
- Merino wool blend
- Flatlock seam construction
- UPF 50 protection
- Slim fit

name: Icebreaker 260 Tech Leggings
description:
The Icebreaker 260 Tech Leggings provide heavyweight merino warmth for cold-weather activities. Naturally breathable and odor-resistant for multi-day missions.

Key Features:
- 260gm merino wool
- Gusseted construction
- Flatlock seams
- Slim fit
- Temperature regulating

name: Mammut Broad Peak Hooded Jacket
description:
The Mammut Broad Peak is a lightweight down jacket perfect for layering or wearing as an outer piece. Premium 750-fill down provides exceptional warmth-to-weight ratio.

Key Features:
- 750 cuin down insulation
- Pertex Quantum ripstop fabric
- Helmet-compatible hood
- Two zip hand pockets
- Packable design

name: Outdoor Research Ascendant Hoody
description:
The Outdoor Research Ascendant Hoody features VerticalX insulation for active warmth. Highly breathable and water-resistant for high-output activities.

Key Features:
- VerticalX Eco insulation
- Weather-resistant Pertex Quantum
- Helmet-compatible hood
- Two hand pockets
- Active fit

name: Darn Tough Merino Ski Socks
description:
Darn Tough ski socks deliver legendary durability and comfort with premium merino wool. Performance cushioning and seamless construction ensure all-day comfort.

Key Features:
- Merino wool construction
- Over-the-calf height
- Performance cushioning
- Seamless toe
- Lifetime guarantee

name: Smartwool PhD Ski Medium Socks
description:
Smartwool PhD Ski socks feature body-mapped cushioning and 4 Degree elite fit system. Indestructawool technology ensures long-lasting performance.

Key Features:
- 4 Degree elite fit
- Indestructawool reinforcement
- Body-mapped cushioning
- Merino wool blend
- Over-the-calf

name: Hestra Army Leather Heli Ski Gloves
description:
The Hestra Army Leather Heli Ski is a backcountry favorite with durable goat leather and removable liner. Long cuffs and cinch straps keep snow out.

Key Features:
- Army Goat Leather shell
- Removable Bemberg/polyester liner
- G-Loft insulation
- Long gauntlet cuff
- Wrist adjustment strap

name: Black Diamond Guide Gloves
description:
The Black Diamond Guide Gloves are waterproof work gloves built for ski touring and alpinism. BDry insert and PrimaLoft insulation provide reliable protection.

Key Features:
- BDry waterproof insert
- PrimaLoft Gold insulation
- Goat leather palm and fingers
- Fixed liner
- Wrist cinch

name: Coal The North Beanie
description:
The Coal North Beanie is a classic rib-knit style with a fold-over cuff. Soft acrylic blend provides warmth without bulk.

Key Features:
- Fine rib-knit construction
- Fold-over cuff
- Soft acrylic blend
- Classic fit
- Unisex design

name: Arc'teryx Rho AR Beanie
description:
The Arc'teryx Rho AR Beanie features Polartec Power Stretch for active warmth. Anatomical shaping and articulated construction ensure a secure, comfortable fit.

Key Features:
- Polartec Power Stretch
- Articulated construction
- Moisture-wicking
- Low profile fit
- Flatlock seams

name: 686 GORE-TEX GT Jacket
description:
The 686 GORE-TEX GT Jacket delivers waterproof performance in a modern fit. infiDRY tech and strategic insulation create the perfect balance.

Key Features:
- GORE-TEX 2L fabric
- 60g/40g body-mapped insulation
- Air-Flo mesh venting
- Removable powder skirt
- Media pocket

name: Salomon QST Guard Jacket
description:
The Salomon QST Guard is a freeride-focused shell with MotionFit articulation. 20K waterproofing handles the deepest days.

Key Features:
- 20K/20K waterproof/breathable
- MotionFit articulated patterning
- Pit zip venting
- Powder skirt with snap integration
- RECCO reflector

name: Picture Organic Zephir Jacket
description:
The Picture Organic Zephir is an eco-friendly shell made from recycled materials. 20K waterproofing and responsible construction for conscious riders.

Key Features:
- 20K/20K waterproof/breathable
- Recycled polyester fabric
- PFC-free DWR treatment
- YKK zippers
- Mesh-lined venting

name: Montane Flux Jacket
description:
The Montane Flux is a lightweight insulated jacket with PrimaLoft Silver for active warmth. Perfect for ski touring and alpine pursuits.

Key Features:
- PrimaLoft Silver insulation
- Pertex Quantum ripstop
- Helmet-compatible hood
- Two hand pockets
- Packable design

name: Rab Microlight Alpine Jacket
description:
The Rab Microlight Alpine combines 700-fill down with weather-resistant Pertex fabric. A versatile insulation piece for mountain adventures.

Key Features:
- 700 fill power down
- Pertex Quantum fabric
- Helmet-compatible hood
- Two hand pockets
- Down-filled collar

name: Flylow Baker Bib Pants
description:
The Flylow Baker Bib delivers bombproof protection with Intuitive 2-layer fabric. A favorite among ski patrollers and guides.

Key Features:
- Intuitive 20K/20K fabric
- Full-side zippers
- Reinforced cuffs and knees
- Zippered chest pocket
- Adjustable suspenders

name: Trew Capow Bib Pants
description:
The Trew Capow Bib is built for deep powder days with a relaxed fit and stretchy 3-layer fabric. Full-length side zips make transitions easy.

Key Features:
- 3-layer stretch fabric
- 20K/20K waterproof/breathable
- Full-length side zippers
- Chest pocket
- Reinforced cuffs

name: YETI Rambler 36oz Bottle
description:
The YETI Rambler 36oz keeps drinks cold or hot for hours. Double-wall vacuum insulation and durable construction make this bottle adventure-ready.

Key Features:
- Double-wall vacuum insulation
- 18/8 stainless steel
- No Sweat Design
- Dishwasher safe
- Chug Cap included

name: Hydro Flask 32oz Wide Mouth
description:
The Hydro Flask 32oz Wide Mouth features TempShield insulation to keep beverages at the perfect temperature. BPA-free and built to last.

Key Features:
- TempShield double-wall insulation
- 18/8 pro-grade stainless steel
- BPA-free
- Flex Cap included
- Lifetime warranty

name: Nalgene Wide Mouth 32oz
description:
The classic Nalgene Wide Mouth is virtually indestructible and completely leak-proof. Perfect for hiking, camping, and everyday hydration.

Key Features:
- BPA/BPS-free Tritan material
- Leak-proof design
- Dishwasher safe
- Wide mouth opening
- Graduated measurements

name: CamelBak Eddy+ 25oz
description:
The CamelBak Eddy+ features a spill-proof bite valve and comfortable carry handle. Lightweight and durable for on-the-go hydration.

Key Features:
- Bite valve with shut-off option
- BPA/BPS/BPF-free Tritan
- Dishwasher safe
- Carry handle
- Leak-proof when closed

name: Klean Kanteen Classic 27oz
description:
The Klean Kanteen Classic is a sustainable choice made from certified 90% post-consumer recycled stainless steel. Simple, durable, and eco-friendly.

Key Features:
- 90% post-consumer recycled steel
- BPA-free
- Climate Lock double-wall insulation
- Loop Cap included
- Chip-resistant finish

name: Petzl Actik Core Headlamp
description:
The Petzl Actik Core is a versatile headlamp with 450 lumens of power. Rechargeable CORE battery and multiple lighting modes make it perfect for any adventure.

Key Features:
- 450 lumen output
- Rechargeable CORE battery
- Red lighting mode
- Reflective headband
- IPX4 water resistance

name: Black Diamond Spot 400 Headlamp
description:
The Black Diamond Spot 400 delivers 400 lumens of power with PowerTap technology for instant brightness adjustment. Waterproof and durable for all conditions.

Key Features:
- 400 lumen output
- PowerTap technology
- Red, green, and blue night vision
- IPX8 waterproof
- Brightness memory

name: Garmin inReach Mini 2
description:
The Garmin inReach Mini 2 provides global satellite communication for backcountry safety. Send messages, share location, and trigger SOS anywhere.

Key Features:
- Two-way satellite messaging
- Interactive SOS to GEOS
- GPS tracking and navigation
- 14-day battery life
- Compact and lightweight

name: Ortovox Diract Voice Avalanche Beacon
description:
The Ortovox Diract Voice features voice navigation for intuitive searching. Smart antenna technology and a large display make rescue operations faster.

Key Features:
- Voice navigation system
- Smart antenna technology
- 70m circular range
- Auto-revert to send mode
- Lithium battery included

name: BCA Tracker4 Avalanche Beacon
description:
The BCA Tracker4 is an updated classic with Tracker's proven Big Picture search mode. Enhanced processing and a sleek design improve rescue efficiency.

Key Features:
- Big Picture search mode
- Signal suppression
- Instant real-time display
- 55m circular range
- Rubberized over-molding
